homepage.heading: Class management rethought.
homepage.text: Help2Teach is an innovative cloud platform specifically designed to help teachers organize and structure their classes. With the help and ideas of teachers, the platform is constantly evolving to provide new, useful classroom management features. From creating seating plans to other practical tools, Help2Teach helps save valuable time so teachers can focus on what's important: teaching.

login-page.heading: Sign in
login-page.description: Please sign in with your email address and password.

login-form.email-error: Please enter a valid email address
login-form.register: Don't have an account yet? Register here.

submit-errors.invalid-credentials: The entered login credentials are invalid.

register-page.heading: Register
register-page.description: Please enter your data to register.

register-form.email-error: Please enter a valid email address
register-form.password-error: Please enter a password with at least 8 characters

submit-messages.confirmation-sent: A confirmation email has been sent to your email address. Please confirm your email address to continue.

submit-errors.email-already-exists: The entered email address is already registered.
submit-errors.user-already-exists: Ein Benutzer mit dieser E-Mail-Adresse existiert bereits.

forgot-password-page.heading: Reset password
forgot-password-page.description: Please enter your email address to reset your password.

forgot-password-form.email-error: Please enter a valid email address

submit-messages.reset-mail-sent: An email to reset your password has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox.

reset-password-form.password-error: Please enter a password with at least 8 characters

submit-messages.password-reset: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now sign in with your new password.

errors.otp-expired: The link to reset the password has expired. Please request a new link.

welcome-page.heading: Welcome to Help2Teach!
welcome-page.text: Your account has been successfully activated. You can now sign in!

create-page.heading: Getting Started
create-page.description: Before you can start, you must first create a class. To do this, enter the name of the class and click on <quotes>Create class</quotes>.

create-dialog.heading: Create a new class
create-dialog.description: Please enter the name of the class you want to create.
create-dialog.name: Name
create-dialog.submit-error-message: An error occurred while creating the class. Please try again.

submit-messages.class-created: The class has been successfully created.

page.heading: Students
page.description: Here you will find an overview of all students in your class. You can add, edit or delete students.

seating-plan.no-seating-plans: There are no seating plans in this class yet.

create-seating-plan-dialog.heading: Create seating plan
create-seating-plan-dialog.description: Enter a name for the seating plan and click on <quotes>Create seating plan</quotes>.
create-seating-plan-dialog.name: Name
create-seating-plan-dialog.name-description: The name of the seating plan
create-seating-plan-dialog.name-error: Please enter a name for the seating plan

rename-dialog.heading: Rename seating plan
rename-dialog.description: Enter a new name for the seating plan and click on <quotes>Rename</quotes>.
rename-dialog.name: Name
rename-dialog.name-description: The name of the seating plan
rename-dialog.name-error: Please enter a name for the seating plan

delete-dialog.heading: Delete seating plan
delete-dialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the seating plan <quotes>{name}</quotes>?

settings.name-input-error: Please enter a name for the seating plan

not-found-page.title: Page not found
not-found-page.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.
